General.Description: Ethereum Classic is a decentralized platform runnning smart contracts: applications run exactly as they are programmed without any possibility of downtime, censorship, fraud or third-party interference.
General.Features: These are some of the ETC coin's features. First, Mist Integration: Allow connecting the Mist browser to the Mantis client over HTTP. Second, Multi-platform: This application has been tested on recent versions of Linux (16.02), Mac OS (El Capitan, Sierra) and Windows (10, 8). Third, Testnet and Private Chain Support: The client is supported synchronizing with the Morden testnet and also creating private chains. Finally, Documented Configuration: Our guest uses neatly formatted configuration files in the “conf” folder to config the client, all the keys as well as values have descriptions to help the users optimize the client’s utility.
General.Technology: Ethereum Classic is based on Blockchain technology. Although there has no integrated the new technology, this coin still works well and creates lots of values for the users.
General.Sponsor: The DAO funds sponsor for Ethereum Classic. The return of DAO fund has brought more value to this coin.
